rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
气温升高会削弱野生卷尾猴的免疫系统密歇根大学的一项研究表明，当野生卷尾猴经历较高的温度时，它们的免疫性能会下降，而年轻的猴子似乎特别容易受到高温的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Warmer-Temperatures-weaken-immune-systems-in-wild-capuchin-monkeys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Warmer-Temperatures-weaken-immune-systems-in-wild-capuchin-monkeys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67a7ef92-6bb9-42ce-9f26-287f8972388b Fri, 29 Nov 2024 20:11:21 -0500 Warmer temperatures weaken immune systems in wild capuchin monkeys
研究强调 PM2.5 暴露对孕妇的健康风险哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项新研究表明，对于孕妇来说，接触细颗粒空气污染 (PM2.5) 会导致免疫反应改变，从而导致不良的分娩结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Study-highlights-the-health-risk-of-PM25-exposure-for-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Study-highlights-the-health-risk-of-PM25-exposure-for-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4957ad3d-29bb-4a2b-bd03-1d3d5772db7c Fri, 29 Nov 2024 20:07:00 -0500 Study highlights the health risk of PM2.5 exposure for pregnant women
COP29 成果未能落实气候健康行动伦敦卫生与热带医学院 (LSHTM) 的专家表示，COP29 达成的协议未能充分解决气候变化对健康的影响并最大限度地发挥行动效益所需的雄心和重点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/COP29-outcomes-fall-short-on-climate-health-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/COP29-outcomes-fall-short-on-climate-health-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c181882-8828-4349-8e01-c73942b80c0e Fri, 29 Nov 2024 20:00:43 -0500 COP29 outcomes fall short on climate health action
KIT 的 3ROCKIT 3R 中心致力于开发替代动物测试的方法在未来的医学中，个性化计算机模型，即所谓的虚拟人类双胞胎，可以帮助规划个体治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/KITe28099s-3ROCKIT-3R-Center-works-towards-developing-methods-to-replace-animal-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/KITe28099s-3ROCKIT-3R-Center-works-towards-developing-methods-to-replace-animal-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc278cbf-de8d-45ea-a5fd-2e4fad8593bf Fri, 29 Nov 2024 19:55:31 -0500 KIT’s 3ROCKIT 3R Center works towards developing methods to replace animal testing
第一阶段研究发现不含丝氨酸和甘氨酸的饮食可增强结直肠癌的免疫反应研究结果表明，不含丝氨酸/甘氨酸的饮食可以减少结直肠癌的生长并增强免疫反应，为免疫治疗策略提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Phase-1-study-finds-serine-and-glycine-free-diet-boosts-immune-response-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Phase-1-study-finds-serine-and-glycine-free-diet-boosts-immune-response-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e9fc5c0-4dea-457d-8e22-865971e2def0 Fri, 29 Nov 2024 10:49:00 -0500 Phase 1 study finds serine- and glycine-free diet boosts immune response in colorectal cancer
恢复期对于维持医疗专业人员的健康和福祉很重要一项研究在两周内评估了 27 名院前急救医生和护理人员的心理生物学功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Recovery-periods-important-to-maintain-the-health-and-well-being-of-medical-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Recovery-periods-important-to-maintain-the-health-and-well-being-of-medical-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f14281b7-16e2-46f6-a0aa-8d39fc9a6f9f Fri, 29 Nov 2024 10:03:00 -0500 Recovery periods important to maintain the health and well-being of medical professionals
细菌会修改其核糖体以响应抗生素根据今天发表在《自然通讯》上的研究，细菌在接触广泛使用的抗生素时会修改其核糖体。这些微妙的变化可能足以改变药物靶点的结合位点，并构成一种可能的新的抗生素耐药机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Bacteria-modify-their-ribosomes-in-response-to-the-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Bacteria-modify-their-ribosomes-in-response-to-the-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b9f9401-40de-4630-909c-12cd1e10022f Fri, 29 Nov 2024 09:58:21 -0500 Bacteria modify their ribosomes in response to the antibiotics
近一半的减肥参与者在开始抗肥胖药物治疗后减少了饮酒研究人员评估开始抗肥胖药物后饮酒的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Nearly-half-of-weight-loss-participants-reduced-alcohol-use-after-starting-anti-obesity-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Nearly-half-of-weight-loss-participants-reduced-alcohol-use-after-starting-anti-obesity-medication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84aed986-1a8b-4cd8-aec0-21bc491af0e1 Fri, 29 Nov 2024 09:24:00 -0500 Nearly half of weight loss participants reduced alcohol use after starting anti-obesity medication
RNA酶被发现是出生后心脏细胞能量转移的关键研究人员研究了 Mettl1 对出生后能量代谢和心脏细胞成熟的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/RNA-enzyme-found-key-to-heart-cell-energy-shift-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/RNA-enzyme-found-key-to-heart-cell-energy-shift-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb2de4ba-d57d-4176-91e8-a4ec7a248cec Fri, 29 Nov 2024 09:09:00 -0500 RNA enzyme found key to heart cell energy shift after birth
科学家发现耐药骨髓细胞与快速生长的白血病的不良预后有关研究人员探索 T 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病的治疗耐药性和复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Scientists-identify-drug-pressive-bone-marrow-cells-linked-to-poor-outcomes-in-fast-forming-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Scientists-identify-drug-pressive-bone-marrow-cells-linked-to-poor-outcomes-in-fast-forming-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6711150-c43a-4279-af27-6ec8bbed51dc Fri, 29 Nov 2024 08:56:00 -0500 Scientists identify drug-resistant bone marrow cells linked to poor outcomes in fast-growing leukemia
